gen:link.label:label: BV689: If entity does not use MAP nor VA nor any transitional measures, then templates S.22.01 - Impact of long term guarantees measures and transitionals, S.22.04 - Information on the transitional on interest rates calculation, S.22.05 - Overall calculation of the transitional on technical provisions and S.22.06 - Best estimate subject to volatility adjustment by country and currency should not be reported. -->Template 1: S.01.01; Template 2: S.01.02; Expression: If {S.01.02, r0170,c0010}=[s2c_PU:x52] and {S.01.02, r0180,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x8] and {S.01.02, r0190,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x10] and {S.01.02, r0200,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x12] then {S.01.01, r0370,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x36] and ({S.01.01, r0380,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x39] or {S.01.01, r0380,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2]) and ({S.01.01, r0390,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x39] or {S.01.01, r0390,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2]) and ({S.01.01, r0400,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x58] or {S.01.01, r0400,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2])

BV689: If entity does not use MAP nor VA nor any transitional measures, then templates S.22.01 - Impact of long term guarantees measures and transitionals, S.22.04 - Information on the transitional on interest rates calculation, S.22.05 - Overall calculation of the transitional on technical provisions and S.22.06 - Best estimate subject to volatility adjustment by country and currency should not be reported. -->Template 1: S.01.01; Template 2: S.01.02; Expression: If {S.01.02, r0170,c0010}=[s2c_PU:x52] and {S.01.02, r0180,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x8] and {S.01.02, r0190,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x10] and {S.01.02, r0200,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x12] then {S.01.01, r0370,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x36] and ({S.01.01, r0380,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x39] or {S.01.01, r0380,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2]) and ({S.01.01, r0390,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x39] or {S.01.01, r0390,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2]) and ({S.01.01, r0400,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x58] or {S.01.01, r0400,c0010}=[s2c_CN:x2])
